full_summary:
===============

### Request for Standing Offer: Venue for Training and Accommodations for RCMP H Division

#### Description of Requirements

The Career Development and Resourcing Section of the Royal Canadian Mounted Police (RCMP) H Division (Nova Scotia) is seeking a venue to provide accommodations and training space for participants on an as-needed basis. The ideal location must be centrally situated within the province of Nova Scotia, specifically within the area encompassing Colchester County, Hants, and the Halifax Regional Municipality. Furthermore, the venue may not be more than 110 kilometers from the RCMP H Division headquarters located at 80 Garland Avenue, Dartmouth, Nova Scotia.

#### Location Requirements

* Centrally located within Nova Scotia (Colchester County, Hants, and Halifax Regional Municipality)
* Maximum distance of 110 kilometers from RCMP H Division headquarters (80 Garland Avenue, Dartmouth, N.S.)

The standing offer will be awarded to the bidder with the highest combined rating of technical merit and price.
